fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Competition, Consumers, International co-operation and development, Customs, Enlargement, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Trans-European Networks, Food Safety, Climate Action, Borders and Security
goals__remit: Lo Studio opera specialmente nei settori del diritto dell’ambiente, della salute e sicurezza sul lavoro, dei servizi pubblici locali e della responsabilità da reato degli enti (d. lgs. 231/2001), prestando alla clientela consulenza e assistenza, stragiudiziale e giudiziale, in sede civile, penale e amministrativa.
